EmailTemplate.name: Key Client Added to Project
EmailTemplate.subject: INFORM: New Client Record Created for {!Project_Site__c.Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A customer record for {!Project_Site__c.Account_Name__c} has been added to {!Project_Site__c.Project__c}. Record details can be reviewed at the following:
{!Project_Site__c.ProjectLink__c}
